objects.name: Artificially Inflate File Sizes
objects.description: <xhtml:p>An adversary modifies file contents by adding data to files for several reasons. Many different attacks could “follow” this pattern resulting in numerous outcomes. Adding data to a file could also result in a Denial of Service condition for devices with limited storage capacity.</xhtml:p>
x_capec_example_instances: <xhtml:p>An adversary could potentially increase file sizes on devices containing limited storage resources, such as SCADA or IOT devices, resulting in denial of service conditions.</xhtml:p>
